Package List

Here are the packages with brief descriptions (if available):
MDAnalysis of molecular simulations in python
MD.analysisMethods for analyzing particle trajectories
MD.analysis.bond_orderMethods for local bond ordering of a group of particles in simulation
MD.analysis.center_massThis module is used to find the center of mass of particles
MD.analysis.connectionsThis module is used to find connections between particle over a series of frames
MD.analysis.histogramThis module is used for creating a histogram of data
MD.analysis.lifetimeFinds lifetime of connections made by groups of particles
MD.analysis.msdThis module msd of atoms and takes into account drift of system by subtracting out center of mass
MD.analysis.msdrFind the deviation of every particle from its point on the recipricol lattice
MD.analysis.nearest_neighborMethods for finding nearest neighbors of particles in a simulation
MD.analysis.particle_distanceThis module is used to find the distance between many particles
MD.analysis.percolateThis module is used to find a network graph between particle over a series of frames
MD.analysis.pyplotThis module is used for making simple plots on the fly using matplotlib
MD.analysis.reconstruct_latticeThis module is used to reconstruct the real space lattice from a structure factor q vectors(note this isn't a very reliable method)
MD.analysis.rotationThis module is used to find rotations of particles in time
MD.baseThis module is meant to contain methods which are repeated often and are simple in nature so that having them here makes code easier to write and read
MD.base.pointsThis module is methods for vector and point operations between particles
MD.base.sphericalThis module is methods for dealing with spherical math
MD.dna_scripts
MD.plotMethods for making nice plots using matplotlib libraries
MD.unitMethods for building crystall lattices and other unit testss methods which are able to meant to aid in analyzing
MD.unit.make_bccThis module is used to generate a unit cell of cscl bcc crystall
MD.util
Generated on Tue Jun 28 15:07:13 2011 for analyzeMD by  1.6.3
